max-font-scale.name: Maximum Font Scale
max-font-scale.hint: Maximum Size to scale font to

top-offset.name: % offset from top of token
top-offset.hint: Offset percentage from top of token, input as whole number (IE. 70 is 70%)

jitter.name: Jitter
jitter.hint: How much the text will move around its spawn point (0 = doesn't move, 1 is it could spawn on the edges of the token)

number-scale-type.name: Number Scale Type
number-scale-type.hint: Scaling type for the size of the RPG Numbers

damage-split.name: Damage Split
damage-split.hint: How to split damage numbers from roll (None: total only, By Type: By damage type, All: Splits all terms)

debug-mode.name: Debug Mode
debug-mode.hint: Have the console receive messages for different stuff

duration.name: Text Duration
duration.hint: How long until the text despawns in seconds

wait-time-between-numbers.name: Wait Time between numbers
wait-time-between-numbers.hint: How long in between each number should the game wait
